short_description_localized.en: With Midtown Manhattan at your feet, relax in our Deluxe room with 200 square feet, a king bed and seating area.
short_description_localized.es: With Midtown Manhattan at your feet, relax in our Deluxe room with 200 square feet, a king bed and seating area.

description_localized.en: In the original land of skyscrapers, you ought to stay on one of our high floors. Offering a luxurious king-size bed, 200 square feet, and a sofa, these accommodations are an extremely comfortable choice in Manhattan at reasonable rates. Plus, you can have a daily complimentary continental breakfast. Max. 2 guests.
